modal.title: Important Safety Information
modal.p_1a: (paliperidone palmitate) is indicated for the treatment of schizophrenia in adult patients. In controlled clinical trials,
modal.p_1b: was found to improve the symptoms of schizophrenia, including positive and negative symptoms.
modal.p_2a: is indicated for the maintenance treatment of schizoaffective disorder in adult patients.
modal.p_3a: , a 3-month injection, is indicated for the treatment of schizophrenia in adult patients.
modal.p_3b: is to be used only after
modal.p_3c: (1-month paliperidone palmitate prolonged-release injectable suspension) has been established as adequate treatment for at least four months. In order to establish a consistent maintenance dose, it is recommended that the last two doses of
modal.p_3d: be the same dosage strength before starting
modal.pm_a: Please consult the Product Monograph at
modal.pm_b: for contraindications, warnings, precautions, adverse reactions, interactions, dosing, and conditions of clinical use.
